meanings.definition: A small wild goat-like animal native to the mountains of central Europe and Asia.
meanings.sent1: The gorals gracefully climbed the rocky slopes in search of fresh grass.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of gorals while hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The gorals played a game of hide-and-seek among the boulders.
meanings.sent4: The elusive gorals seemed to blend into the rugged terrain like living shadows.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the gorals leaping across the cliffs left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: A type of mountain-dwelling antelope found in eastern Europe and Asia.
meanings.sent1: We were lucky to see a herd of gorals grazing on the alpine meadows.
meanings.sent2: The gorals moved swiftly and gracefully through the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent3: The gorals seemed to be having a dance party on the mountain slopes.
meanings.sent4: The gorals' agility in navigating steep cliffs was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gorals silhouetted against the setting sun was breathtaking.
